Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Interface yii\web\AssetConverterInterface

All Classes | Methods
Implemented byyii\web\AssetConverter
Available since version2.0
Source Code
The AssetConverterInterface must be implemented by asset converter classes.

Public Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
convert() Converts a given asset file into a CSS or JS file. yii\web\AssetConverterInterface

Method Details

convert() method
string convert( $asset, $basePath )
$asset string The asset file path, relative to $basePath
$basePath string The directory the $asset is relative to.
return string the converted asset file path, relative to $basePath.

Converts a given asset file into a CSS or JS file.
